summary:
────────────────────────────────
**Summary**
• Waymo gets green light for robotaxi rides at San Jose airport.
• First airport in California to offer this service, following Phoenix.
• Rides will be to and from the airport, no word on exact start date.

Impact — Robotaxis are taking over airports, and it’s only the beginning.

────────────────────────────────
Link: https://techcrunch.com/2025/09/04/waymo-cleared-to-offer-robotaxi-rides-at-san-jose-airport/
